mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.name, l.content, l.expired_time_homework, l.subject_id, l.created_by, l.created_date FROM lesson l WHERE l.subject_id = #{subjectId} AND l.active_flag = 1 AND l.delete_flag = 0;
SELECT l.id, l.name, l.content, l.expired_time_homework, l.subject_id, l.created_by, l.created_date FROM lesson l WHERE l.id = #{id} AND l.active_flag = 1 AND l.delete_flag = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE lesson SET `name` = #{item.name}, content = #{item.content}, expired_time_homework = #{item.expiredTimeHomework}, last_modified_date = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), last_modified_by = #{item.lastModifiedBy} WHERE id = #{item.id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lesson(`name`, content, expired_time_homework, subject_id, delete_flag, active_flag, created_date, created_by, last_modified_date, last_modified_by) VALUES (#{item.name}, #{item.content}, #{item.expiredTimeHomework}, #{item.subjectId}, b'0', b'1', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), #{item.createdBy}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), #{item.lastModifiedBy})
